Name: Gripper: Prologue
About the game: In a world where everyone is damaged one way or another you and your sister live peacefully on a farm. Until someone comes and burns it down. All you have left is your car with a hook. The time to learn how to kill with it is running out. Tear your enemies apart with a hook and finish them with their own weapons. Fight and rip away the hearts of 2 colossal bosses to gain new abilities. Explore 4 bizarre biomes. Fight and fly through a nightmarish tunnel to the beat of incredible tracks by KillTheBarber!, Mezzanine, pqQp. Gripper: Prologue is the start of your own personal story of loss. We turned it into the game to let it go and move on. We hope it will help you too.
